meanings.definition: To move or spin rapidly in an outward direction.
meanings.sent1: The leaves outwhirls in the wind.
meanings.sent2: The dancer outwhirls gracefully on stage.
meanings.sent3: The tornado outwhirls everything in its path.
meanings.sent4: Her excitement outwhirls like a whirlwind.
meanings.sent5: The carousel outwhirls with colorful lights and music.

meanings.definition: To surpass in swirling or spinning motion.
meanings.sent1: The top outwhirls all the other toys.
meanings.sent2: His spinning technique outwhirls his competitors.
meanings.sent3: The record player outwhirls the old jukebox.
meanings.sent4: Her energy outwhirls around her like a cyclone.
meanings.sent5: The tornado outwhirls with incredible force and speed.
